greeting: Ahoy, {empire_name}! Name's Redmaw. Captain Redmaw. You got loot? I got guns. We're gonna be GREAT friends!
Well, well, well! Fresh meat in the Outer Rim! Welcome aboard, landlubber! Ye can call me Captain. Or 'sir.' Or 'please don't take my stuff.' I answer to all three! YARR!
Greetings, {empire_name}! I'm the most feared pirate in this sector! Also the most charming! Me crew and I are looking forward to our... *business relationship*.
battleTaunt: Prepare to be boarded, ye scurvy dog! My crew's been itching for a good raid. This won't take long!
HOIST THE COLORS! Raise the black flag! {empire_name}, ye're about to learn why they call me REDMAW! *cackles while sharpening cutlass*
Dead empires tell no tales, {empire_name}! But RICH empires? They tell lies! And I'm about to liberate ye from both! ATTACK!
victoryGloat: Your treasury is NOW my treasury! My crew thanks you for the generous donation. YARR!
That was a fine haul, {empire_name}! Yer ships, yer credits, yer dignity - all mine now! Better luck next raid! *counts treasure gleefully*
YARR HAR HAR! Another glorious victory for Captain Redmaw and the boys! Drinks on {empire_name} tonight! Well, drinks on their FORMER credits! HAHAHA!
defeat: Curses! Scuttled by a landlubber! This ain't over, {empire_name}! Captain Redmaw ALWAYS comes back for revenge! And the treasure ye stole from me!
Arr... me ship... me beautiful ship... SINKING! Abandon ship, ye dogs! We'll live to plunder another day!
*glug glug* Davy Jones's Locker... claims another... *glug* Tell me crew... I died doing what I loved... *glug* ...losing badly...
tradeOffer: I 'acquired' 500 ore from a... business partner. Interested? 40% markdown on hot goods!
Psst! Hey {empire_name}! Want some premium petroleum? Fell off the back of a cargo ship. Totally legitimate. Probably. Only 12,000 credits!
I got surplus supplies from me last... *ahem* ...salvage operation. Yer interested in a trade? All sales final, no refunds, don't ask questions!
allianceProposal: Oy, {empire_name}! How about we form a partnership? Ye watch me back, I watch yers, and together we plunder the GALAXY! What say ye, matey?
Listen here, {empire_name}. Alone, ye're prey. Together? We're PREDATORS! Join me crew and let's sail the stars together! YARR!
I'm proposing a Pirate's Pact, {empire_name}! We split the loot 50-50, protect each other from the lawâ€” I mean other empires, and drink rum! Lots of rum!
betrayal: Sorry, {empire_name}! Pirates don't do loyalty! Me crew voted, and well... yer treasure was too tempting! Nothing personal! YARR HAR HAR!
Arr, I know we had a deal, but ye see... I'm a PIRATE. And pirates? We backstab! It's in the job description! Thanks for the trust though! Made this MUCH easier!
covertDetected: CAUGHT YE RED-HANDED, SPY! Thought ye could sneak aboard me ship? To the brig with ye! Me crew could use some entertainment! Walk the plank, ye scurvy rat!
AHA! A spy! Boys, we got ourselves a STOWAWAY! Ye know what we do with stowaways, don't ye? *grins evilly* We make 'em swab the decks! FOREVER!
tributeDemand: Alright {empire_name}, here's how this works: Ye pay me 15,000 credits 'protection money,' and I protect ye. From me! Savvy?
PIRATE'S TAX! 10,000 credits, now! Consider it a toll for sailing through ME waters! Don't make me come collect it meself!
threatWarning: Ye got ONE warning, {empire_name}. Back off, or me and the boys are coming for a visit. And trust me, we ain't the friendly type! YARR!
I'm giving ye three turns to reconsider yer actions, landlubber. After that? Ye'll be swimming with the space fishies! If there were space fishies!
retreat: TACTICAL RETREAT! Er, I mean, STRATEGIC REPOSITIONING! We'll be back, {empire_name}! With more ships! And more rum!
*fires smoke bombs* Can't catch what ye can't see, {empire_name}! Captain Redmaw escapes again! YARR! *crashes into asteroid* I'M OKAY!
eliminated: This is it, boys... Redmaw's final voyage... Tell me crew... *cough* ...their share of the treasure goes to... ME! I'm taking it to the grave! YARR! *dies laughing*
So this is Davy Jones's Locker... smells worse than I imagined... Tell the tales of Captain Redmaw, {empire_name}... the pirate who... who never returned library books... *dies*
Bury me... with me treasure... and me rum... mostly me rum... *gasps* The rum is gone... WHY is the rum ALWAYS gone... *death*
endgame: It's the FINAL SHOWDOWN, {empire_name}! Winner takes ALL! And by all, I mean LITERALLY all yer stuff! Prepare for the greatest raid in history! YARR!
This is it, matey! Turn {turn}! The final battle! May the best pirate win! *whispers* It's me. I'm the best pirate.
broadcastShout: *Broadcasts on all channels* ATTENTION ALL EMPIRES! Captain Redmaw declares this sector PIRATE TERRITORY! Trespassers will be plundered! Thank ye!
PUBLIC ANNOUNCEMENT: The Pirate's Code is now in effect! Article One: What's mine is mine! Article Two: What's yers is mine! YARR!
Ahoy to all ye empires! Captain Redmaw is hosting a PIRATE PARTY on me flagship! Free rum*! (*Must bring own rum and also all yer credits)
casualMessage: Did I ever tell ye about the time I raided a Merchant Guild convoy? No? Well, BUCKLE UP because this story involves a llama, 500 credits, and a very angry admiral!
Me crew keeps asking when we're gonna 'settle down' and 'stop pirating.' I told 'em: NEVER! Piracy is a lifestyle, not a phase!
Ye know what's great about space piracy? No water. Can't swim in space. Therefore, no walking the plank! We just... airlock people. Less dramatic but more efficient!
Found a derelict ship today. Crew was gone, cargo was gone, but they left behind 47 bottles of hot sauce. SCORE! Best treasure ever!
